content.description: A good run can unlock new ideas – we call this “Runfulness” and we’re on a mission to explore its power. Share your experience with Runfulness for a chance to receive funds to turn your ideas into reality through the Run Fund.

cover.alt: An illustrated world with the text "The Runfulness Project" in front of it, surrounded by clouds, sparkles and arrow graphics.

copyBlock.headline: Forget your feet and free your mind
copyBlock.copy: We like to think of Runfulness as mindfulness unlocked by running. It’s the effect of a run that is so good, so freeing, it allows you to forget your feet altogether – taking your mind to places your feet can’t go. It’s in this state where you find the power to change a day, a life, the world. Discover one runner’s Runfulness journey below.

image.alt: An illustrated world with the text "The Runfulness Project" in front of it, surrounded by clouds, sparkles and arrow graphics.

copyBlock.headline: "I feel like all my ideas come from running. I dig into my thoughts and that's when they come into light and color. When I run, that's when I have clarity. That's my Runfulness."
What is the Run Fund?
copyBlock.copy: As part of our ongoing journey to share and tap into the power of Runfulness, we want to hear how Runfulness has inspired you. We asked runners to share how Runfulness led them to an idea that changes a day, a life, or even the world. In return, we’re donating funds and resources to help fuel those ideas further.

copyBlock.headline: The Glycerin 19 is our softest shoe yet.
copyBlock.copy: Packed with cushioning, the Glycerin 19 helps you forget your feet and free your mind so you can reach a state of Runfulness.

image.alt: Close-up shot of the man standing in a pair of blue Brooks Glycerin 19 shoes.
